about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: AI Passion, Engineering Vision
about.bio: I'm a 4th-year Computer Engineering student at İnönü University. Since 2022, I've been focusing on artificial intelligence and machine learning, developing various projects with technologies like Python, TensorFlow, and Scikit-learn. I've gained experience across a wide range of areas, from image processing to natural language processing, from reinforcement learning to deep learning. In every project, I make it a principle to translate theory into practice, solve complex problems with analytical thinking, and continuously learn. My goal is to specialize in AI/ML after graduation and become an engineer who applies data science and AI technologies to real-world problems. I value contributing to open-source projects, writing technical blog posts, and sharing knowledge.

visualAI.title: Real-Time Visual Understanding AI
visualAI.tagline: AI system that analyzes images from camera in real-time using Ollama LLaVA model. Understands and describes visual content instantly.
visualAI.impact: Built with Python, Ollama, LLaVA, OpenCV.

handwriting.title: Handwriting Digit Recognition
handwriting.tagline: Deep learning model trained on MNIST dataset using CNN and OpenCV. Real-time drawing interface for recognizing handwritten digits.
handwriting.impact: Built with TensorFlow, Keras, OpenCV, CNN architecture.

diabetes.title: Diabetes Prediction System
diabetes.tagline: Machine learning model for early diabetes diagnosis. Data analysis, preprocessing, and multiple classification algorithms applied.
diabetes.impact: Built with Python, Scikit-learn, Pandas, NumPy.

xoxBot.title: XOX Bot - Q-Learning AI
xoxBot.tagline: AI-powered Tic-Tac-Toe bot trained with Q-Learning algorithm. Develops strategies through reinforcement learning to make optimal moves.
xoxBot.impact: Built with Python, Q-Learning, Reinforcement Learning.

salary.title: Salary Prediction Model
salary.tagline: Machine learning model for predicting baseball player salaries. Exploratory data analysis, feature engineering, and regression algorithms applied.
salary.impact: Built with Python, Scikit-learn, Feature Engineering.

neuron.title: Simple Artificial Neuron
neuron.tagline: Educational project demonstrating the fundamental principles of artificial neural networks. Neuron structure and activation function implementation.
neuron.impact: Built from scratch with Python and NumPy.

pharmacy.title: Pharmacy Automation System
pharmacy.tagline: Automation software developed for pharmacy management. Automates stock tracking, medicine management, and sales operations.
pharmacy.impact: Built with C# and database management.

busTicket.title: Bus Ticket Reservation System
busTicket.tagline: Ticket reservation system built using object-oriented programming and data structures. Features passenger management and seat selection.

thinking.title: My Problem-Solving Philosophy
thinking.subtitle: Principles I follow when transforming complex problems into simple solutions.
thinking.quote: A good engineer never starts coding without understanding the problem first.

firstPrinciples.title: Understand First, Solve Later
firstPrinciples.description: I never start coding without fully understanding the problem. I analyze requirements, consider edge cases, then move to implementation.

outcome.title: Simplicity First
outcome.description: The best code is the least complex code. I avoid premature optimization and focus on readable, maintainable solutions.

iterations.title: Bugs = Learning
iterations.description: Every bug is an opportunity to understand how the system works. Instead of quick fixes, I investigate the root cause.

systems.title: Data-Driven Thinking
systems.description: I base decisions on data, not intuition. I measure model performance with metrics and validate with A/B testing.

debugging.title: Documentation Culture
debugging.description: Half of software is code, the other half is documentation. I leave explanatory notes even for my future self.

curiosity.title: Continuous Learning
curiosity.description: Technology constantly evolves. I try to learn something new every day and experiment to stay current.
